thread.title: 5 Eye Shadow Palettes You Should Invest In, If You’re A Fan Of The Coloured Eye Make-Up Trend
thread.title_full: 5 Eye Shadow Palettes You Should Invest In, If You’re A Fan Of The Coloured Eye Make-Up Trend

title: 5 Eye Shadow Palettes You Should Invest In, If You’re A Fan Of The Coloured Eye Make-Up Trend
text:
facebook 
Coloured eye make-up looks have been everywhere recently, and celebrities across Bollywood and our firang counterparts, Hollywood, have been rocking this vibrant trend. And of course, there are now a bazillion eye shadow palettes available to accommodate all the burgundy, blue and peach looks that are so popular. Unfortunately, some of them are either too expensive or out of stock most of the time. But that doesn't mean we should be left behind. If you're keen on giving coloured eye make-up a shot, but are unable to get your hands on the more expensive palettes, we've got you. Here are five easily available, good quality eye shadow palettes that have all the colours you need, and are slightly easier on the pocket. Maybelline New York The Blushed Nudes Palette 
If you're looking for slightly subdued colours that still make an impact, then this is the palette for you. You're going to fall in love with the gradient of rose shades. 
Available here NYX Ultimate Shadow Palette in Brights 
This palette is as colourful as a box full of Holi colours, and that's why we adore it. 
Available at NYX or Sephora outlets Makeup Revolution Redemption Palette in Mermaids vs Unicorns 
If you're a fan of blues, greens and purples, this palette is going to have you mesmerised. 
Available here L.A. Girl Beauty Brick Eyeshadow in Neons 
This palette is almost like a rainbow of colours, and even includes white, black and silvery grey shadows. 
Available here Freedom Pro Decadence Palette in Clubbed To Death 
Another crazy bright palette, this one will probably have you spend hours trying all the various, gorgeous hues out.
